title: Research Team - Threshold Optimization Agents
purpose: A/B test threshold parameters and field constants to optimize morphogenetic framework performance

overview.concept: Operational Team (Weaver, Builder, Scavenger) executes known-good policies. Research Team (Theorist, Experimenter, Analyst) tests variations, measures outcomes, and recommends parameter improvements.
overview.architecture: Dual-layer morphogenetic framework with feedback loop
overview.update_cycle: Experiment runs: 1 hour (3600 ticks), Analysis cycle: every hour, Recommendations: daily

theorist.responsibility: Propose threshold variations based on historical performance
methods: Sensitivity analysis: vary each θ by ±10%, ±20%
Correlation analysis: identify which thresholds most affect outcome metrics
Dimensionality reduction: find pareto-optimal threshold combinations

experimenter.responsibility: Run hypothesis tests with proper isolation, randomization, and control

analyst.responsibility: Analyze experiment results and recommend threshold improvements
